nodes.bodyText:
This goes for all document indexing APIs.
Not sure how tests aren't failing due to this.
Will double check. That's a miss after merge conflicts.
Do you have tests on throwOnError to false?
There are a few test that are setting the value, don't remember if it was true or false, but it should trigger a compile error.
Will add tests for the senarios.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ To see additional help and options, run:
 Fork and clone https://github.com/Azure/autorest.java 
 git checkout v4
 git submodule update --init --recursive
-mvn package -Dlocal
+mvn package -Dlocal -DskipTests

nodes.bodyText: The test needs to setup local server to run. So I skip tests which is enough for building the package.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ To see additional help and options, run:
 Fork and clone https://github.com/Azure/autorest.java 
 git checkout v4
 git submodule update --init --recursive
-mvn package -Dlocal
+mvn package -Dlocal -DskipTests

nodes.bodyText: Any reason why we are targeting a commit?

nodes.bodyText:
This agrees all across languages.
The swagger could be changed in future. We don't want to introduce any new changes without notice when regenerate codes.
